diff.ccm2.c
diff.ccm2.w
df-com2
blocks.content: A device to add commutativity to various sorts of rings. I use ` ran g ` because I suppose ` g ` has a neutral element and therefore is onto. (Contributed by FL, 6-Sep-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-com2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccm2, copab(s0, s1, wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

thm iscom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), ccm2), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), ccm2), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(hs1, hs0, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))))
  eleq2d(cop(c0, c2), ccm2, copab(hs1, hs0, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(ccm2, copab(hs1, hs0, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))))
  df-com2(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  opelopabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wral(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, crn(cv(hs1)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  raleqdv(s1, crn(cv(hs1)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  rneq(cv(hs1), c0)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, crn(c0), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm iscom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(< c0, c2 > ∈ Com2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), < c0, c2 > ∈ Com2, ∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), < c0, c2 > ∈ { < hs1, hs0 > | ∀(s0 ∈ ran(hs1), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))})
  eleq2d(< c0, c2 >, ccm2, { < hs1, hs0 > | ∀(s0 ∈ ran(hs1), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))}, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), Com2 = { < hs1, hs0 > | ∀(s0 ∈ ran(hs1), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))})
  df-com2(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  opelopabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, ∀(s0 ∈ ran(hs1), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))))
  raleqbidv(s0, ran(hs1), ran(c0), hs1 = c0, ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs1),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))
  raleqdv(s1, ran(hs1), ran(c0), hs1 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))
  rneq(hs1, c0)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, ran(c0), ran(c0), hs0 = c2, (s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))
  eqeq12d((s0[hs0]s1), (s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c2]s1), (s1[c2]s0), hs0 = c2)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s0, s1)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s1, s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ ran(c0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(c0),(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm iscrngo2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  bitri(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c0, ccm2)))
  iscrngo(c0)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c0, ccm2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wcel(c0, ccm2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  mpan(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(crngo))
  relrngo()
  1st2nd(crngo, c0)
  syl6bb(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(c0, ccm2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), ccm2))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), ccm2)
  3bitr4ri(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), ccm2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))))))
  raleqi(s0, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))))
  raleqbii(s1, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))))
  eqtri(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(c3))
  rneqi(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqeq12i(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))
  oveqi(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  oveqi(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  mp2an(wb(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), ccm2), wral(s0, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wral(s1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), universe))
  fvex(c1st, c0)

  diff.crn.s(s0, cfv(c1st, c0))

thm iscrngo2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CRingOps ↔(c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))))
  ⊣ c3 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 = ran(c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CRingOps ↔(c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))), d(s1, c1))
  bitri(c0 ∈ CRingOps, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))), (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c0 ∈ Com2))
  iscrngo(c0)
  pm5.32i(c0 ∈ RingOps, c0 ∈ Com2, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  syl(c0 ∈ RingOps, (c0 ∈ Com2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))), c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>)
  mpan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, Rel(RingOps))
  relrngo()
  1st2nd(crngo, c0)
  syl6bb(c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, c0 ∈ Com2, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)> ∈ Com2)
  eleq1(c0, <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, ccm2)
  3bitr4ri(<(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)> ∈ Com2, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ ran((1st ` c0)), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))))
  raleqi(s0, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0)))
  ralbii(s0, c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0)))
  raleqbii(s1, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), (s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0), (s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))
  eqtri(c1, ran((1st ` c0)), ran(c3))
  rneqi(c3, (1st ` c0))
  eqeq12i((s0[c2]s1), (s1[c2]s0), (s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1), (s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0))
  oveqi(s0, c2, s1, (2nd ` c0))
  oveqi(s1, c2, s0, (2nd ` c0))
  mp2an((<(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)> ∈ Com2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ran((1st ` c0)), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((1st ` c0)),(s0[(2nd ` c0)]s1)=(s1[(2nd ` c0)]s0)))), (1st ` c0)∈ 𝕌, (2nd ` c0)∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(c1st, c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  iscom2(s0, s1, (1st ` c0), universe, (2nd ` c0), universe)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (1st ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
}

thm iscringd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccring))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cablo))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, crn(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c0, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, c3), cv(s1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

thm crngocom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c5))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, ccring), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  mpan9(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ccring), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, crngo))
  iscrngo2(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c4, c5)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, c1)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0)), co(c1, c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c4, cv(hs1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c4)
  eqeq12d(co(c1, c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, c1), co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1, c4)
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c3, c4, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)

}

thm crngocom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1))
  ⊣ c5 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c5)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈ CRingOps, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1))
  mpan9(c0 ∈ CRingOps, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ CRingOps, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0))), c0 ∈ RingOps)
  iscrngo2(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c4, c5)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, (hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0), (c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1), (c1[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]c1))
  eqeq12d((hs0[c4]hs1), (hs1[c4]hs0), (c1[c4]hs1), (hs1[c4]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c4, hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, hs1, c4)
  eqeq12d((c1[c4]hs1), (hs1[c4]c1), (c1[c4]c3), (c3[c4]c1), hs1 = c3)
  oveq2(hs1, c3, c1, c4)
  oveq1(hs1, c3, c4, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c1[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]c1))
  diff.hs1.w((c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1))

thm crngm23(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c1st, c0))

} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, ccring), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))

  crngocom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccring), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4))), wcel(c0, crngo))
  rngoass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccring), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3))), wcel(c0, crngo))
  crngorngo(c0)
  3imp2(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3))))
  com34(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3))))
  3exp2(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3))))
  rngoass(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, c6)
}

thm fldcrng(class c0) {

} = {

  drngoi(c0, cfv(c2nd, c0), crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
